content:
You love classical music? Me too!
Especially before bed, accompanied by elegant melodies,
slowly drifting off to the realm of dreams.

So if you hear any pop songs you really like,
would you share them with me?
I rarely listen to pop music.

I suddenly realized why popular music is called popular music,
it's because it brings people together,
and allows us to experience the joy of it together.

Just thought of something, so I wanted to ask,
what type of <color=#8AAB4B>music</color> do you like the most?

Ah, I see.
Many people get lost in the melodies and improvisations of jazz,
And it seems you're one of them.
